original_text: Jesus, knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he had come from God and was going back to God,
korean_text: 저녁 먹는 중 예수는 아버지께서 모든 것을 자기 손에 맡기신 것과 또 자기가 하나님께로부터 오셨다가 하나님께로 돌아가실 것을 아시고

sentences.original_text: Jesus, knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 아버지께서 만물을 자기 손에 주신 것을 아시고,

sentences.original_text: and that he had come from God
and was going back to God,
